name: Deathwhisper
rules:
Long-Range (When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deal no combat damage to the attacker.)
Heartstrike: If Sylvanas would deal damage with this weapon to a damaged Scourge, she deals double that much instead.

name: Highlord Tirion Fordring
rules: Touch of the Light: Tirion has Mend 1. (At the start of your turn, he may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.);On your turn: 6 -> Flip Tirion.;BACK:;The Light's Vengeance: When Tirion flips to this side, search your desk and/or graveyard for Ashbringer and put it into play. Then, he deaks 2 unpreventable holy damage to target Scourge hero or ally for each friendly Paladin and Priest.;The Light's Blessing: Tirion has Mend 2.
flavour: No more lives will be consumed by your hatred!

name: Dark Lady Sylvanas Windrunner
rules: Song of Sylvanas: Sylvanas and allies in her party have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.);On your turn: 7 -> Flip Sylvanas.;BACK:;Shriek of the Highborne: When Sylvanas flips to this side, she deals 7 shadow damage to target Scourge hero or ally.;Emprowered Song of Sylvanas: Sylvanas and allies in her party have Assault 2.
flavour: You will not escape me that easily, Arthas! I will have my vengeance!

name: Lady Jaina Proudmoore
rules: Brilliance Aura: If Jaina would deal damage with an ability, she deals that much +1 instead.;On your turn: 8 -> Flip Jaina.;BACK:;Teleport: When Jaina flips to this side, you may search your deak for up to two allies and put them into play.;Emprowered Brilliance Aura: If Jaina would deal damage with an ability, she deals that much +2 instead.
flavour: You won't deny me this, Arthas! I must know... I must find out...

name: Frostmourne
rules: Harvest Soul: When the Lich King deals fatal damage to an opposing ally with Frostmourne, add a +1 ATK counter to it, and the Lich King deals 2 frost damage to each opposing hero.;Death Rattle (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere): Put Frostmourne into its owner's hand.
flavour: Frostmourne hungers. - The Lich King

name: The Lich King
rules: Undeath's Armaments: At the start of your turn, if you control two or more resources, you may search your desk for a card named Frostmourne or Helm of Domination and put it into play.;On your turn: 10 -> Flip the Lich King.;BACK:;Fury of Frostmourne: At the start of your turn, the Lich King deals 300,000 unpreventable shadow damage to each opposing hero.

name: Helm of Domination
rules: Leader of the Scourge: Once per turn: 1 -> Target ally has Ferocity this turn.;Death Rattle (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere): Put this armor into its owner's hand.
flavour: Bow down before your lord and master! - The Lich King

name: Ashbringer
rules: Invincible (This weapon can't be leave play or be targeted.)
flavour: A finer blade has never been crafted by my hand. - King Magni Bronzebeard

name: Staff of Antonidas
rules: Courage of Antonidas: On your turn: Exhaust Jaina -> Reveal the top card of your deck. This turn, you may put it into your hand, play it for free, or if it a quest, place it as an additional resource.

name: Lord Marrowgar
rules: Bone Storm: When Lord Marrowgar is destroyed, he deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero for each ally in its controller's graveyard.
flavour: BONE STORM!

name: Lady Deathwhisper
rules: Frostbolt Volley: When Lady Deathwhisper enters play, she deals 2 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: This shall be your final resting place.

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
rules: Protector;Blood Power: Deathbringer Saurfang has +1 ATK for each damage on him.
flavour: Your soul will find no redemption here!

name: Rotface
rules: Protector;Slime Spray: At the start of each opponent's turn, Rotface deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally that player control.
flavour: Icky sticky.

name: Festergut
rules: Protector;Vile Gas: When Festergut enters play, he deals 5 shadow damage to each opposing hero.
flavour: Fun time!

name: Professor Putricide
rules: Protector;Unstable Experiment: At the end of your turn, roll a die. When you roll a die this way, Professor Putricide deals that much nature damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Good news, everyone!

name: Prince Valanar
rules: When Prince Valanar enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Keleseth and a second card named Prince Taldaram and put them into play.;Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
flavour: Naxxanar was merely a setback!

name: Prince Keleseth
rules: When Prince Keleseth enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Valanar and a second card named Prince Taldaram and put them into play.;Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
flavour: Blood will flow!

name: Prince Taldaram
rules: When Prince Taldaram enters play, search your desk and/or hand for a card named Prince Valanar and a second card named Prince Keleseth and put them into play.;Invocation of Blood: Oppopsing allies lose and can't have power.
flavour: Delight in the pain!

name: Blood Queen Lana'thel
rules: Vampiric Bite: When Blood Quenn Lana'thel enters play, each opponent chooses an ally he controls. Gain control of those allies.

name: Valthira Dreamwalker
rules: Valthira Dreamwalker enters play with 3 damage.;Emerald Vigor: At the start of your turn, draw a card if Valthira Dreamwalker is damaged.;Valthira Dreamwalker can't attack or be attacked.
flavour: Heroes, lend me your aid!

name: Sindragosa
rules: Icy Grip: If an opposing hero or ally attacks, it must attack Singragosa if able.
flavour: Your incursion ends here! None shall survive.

name: Drudge Ghoul
rules: Servant on Undeath: You may play this ally from your graveyard.
flavour: So... the Light's vaunted justice has finally arrived? - The Lich King

name: Shambling Horror
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: When my work is complete, you will beg for mercy... and I will deny you. - The Lich King

name: Valkyr Shadowguard
rules: Grab and Drop: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ally.
flavour: Val'kyr, your master calls! - The Lich King

name: Vile Spirit
rules: Spirit Burst: When this ally is destroyed, it deals 5 shadow damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: I would not want the Light's greatest champion to miss seeing the wretched world remade in my image. - The Lich King

name: Defile
rules: Each opponent discards a card, turns a resource he controls face down, and destroys an ability and equipmant he controls.
flavour: Your anguished cries will be a testament to my unbridled power. - The Lich King

name: Infest
rules: The Lich King deals 3 shadow damage to target ally. When that ally is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: The end has come! - The Lich King

name: Necrotic Plague
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of the Lich King's turn, he deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero for each ally in its controller's graveyard.

name: Pain and Suffering
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies have -2 ATK while attacking.;At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, the Lich King deals 4 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

name: Quake
rules: Exhaust all opposing cards.
flavour: Watch as the world around you collapses!

name: Raging Spirit
rules: Target opponent reveals his hand, and you put an ally from it into play under your control with ability attached to it.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2 and is also a Scourge ally.

name: Remorseless Winter
rules: Ongoing: This ability enters play with four frozen counters.;When an opponent plays a card, the Lich King deals 5 frost damage to that player's hero, then remove a frozen counter from this ability. If none remain, destroy this ability.

name: Soul Reaper
rules: Interrupt target card. If you do, the Lich King heals damage from himself equal to that card's cost.
flavour: Hope wanes! - The Lich King

name: Ashes to Ashes
rules: Put 1 to initiate this event.;Event: Draw a card for each ally that was destroyed this turn.
flavour: You delivered the greatest fighting force this world has ever known, right into my hands - exectly as I inthended. - The Lich King

name: Fallen Champions
rules: Pay 2 to initiate this event.;Event: Draw a card for each opposing hero the was dealt damage this turn.
flavour: Azeroth's fall will come at their hands - and you will be the first to die. - The Lich King

name: Justice of the Grave
rules: Pay 2 to initiate this event.;Event: Each opponent puts the top five cards of his deck into his graveyard. Dray two card.
flavour: Is it truly righteousness that drives you? I wonder. - The Lich King

name: One True King
rules: Pay 1 to initiate this event.;Event: Draw a card.
flavour: No question remains unanswered. No doubts linger. - The Lich King

name: Servants of Undeath
rules: On your turn: Pay 1 to initiate event.;Event: Put up to two target cards from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Watch now as I raise them from the dead to become masters of the Scourge. - The Lich King

name: Vindictive Strike
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally was dealt damage this turn.

name: Redemption
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. Draw a card.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2010,Fires of Outland (EA),Archive

name: Holy Light
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Hammer of Justice
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive

name: Blessing of Trials
rules: Attach to target ally. The next time it would be dealt damage by an opposing hero or ally this turn, prevent that damage and put that many strength counters on this ability.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1 for each strength counter.

name: Blessing of Defense
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 ATK while defending.

name: Blessed Defense
rules: Target ally has Protector this turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt while defending this turn.

name: Whiteout
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller pays - 1 for each attacker.

name: Sear
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally was dealt damage this turn.

name: Frostbolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Scorch
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Through the Dark Portal (EA)

name: Frost Nova
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Counterspell
rules: Interrupt target ability.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive

name: Fireball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Turn the Blade
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card has -3 ATK.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Steady Shot
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks

name: Multi-Shot
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
